title: Improve support Google IME
body: I tried the converted app using IME. Microsoft IME and JustSystems ATOK work fine. But Google IME launch failed as message is "Launch failed, please system reboot" on Creators Update. Of course, Win32 Apps and UWP Apps can use Goggle IME. We want to improve support Google IME.

comments.body:
Yes, I used converted App, for example https://www.microsoft.com/store/apps/9njg526bqn7t.
And google IME is https://www.google.co.jp/ime/, JustSystem ATOK is http://www.atok.com/try/.

In my investigate results, this behavior depend on IME user dictionary redirect.
MS-IME and ATOK user dictionary redirect to %UserProfile%\Packages\PackageFamilyId\LocalCash\Roaming\Microsoft\IME or JustSystem\ATOK folder.
But Google IME don't have no data.
I think that converted apps must use user's dictionary on System than per app's dictionary.
